_sText:
Notes on where to get scouts and how to get up to the awp platform on each side:
This map has a scout door at each spawn just hit "E" to open it. There is an invisable ladder on each small fort which you climb up and jump into the corner of the map to hit the teleport which teleports you to an awp room then you break the glass in front of you to walk into the teleporter which teleports you to the awp platform.(Dont worry you wont miss the teleporter and hit the ground and die)


Now to get to the top platform with the dac dac's youll have to find the hidden button which opens a invisable door then you go into a teleporter.


Hope you enjoy my map.

Made by:
Killa
